meanings.definition: relating to or written in capital letters
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to write their names in UPPERCASE letters.
meanings.sent2: In the title of the book, the author used UPPERCASE text for emphasis.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to type in UPPERCASE on the keyboard but kept hitting the wrong keys.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like an UPPERCASE exclamation mark at the end of a sentence.
meanings.sent5: The UPPERCASE words on the sign caught everyone's attention immediately.

meanings.sent1: The password must contain at least one UPPERCASE letter for security.

meanings.sent3: The detective found a mysterious note with an UPPERCASE 'X' at the bottom.
